text:
US We are making the world fitter, healthier, and happier through the power of communities. We are looking for someone with a passion for creating software that delights users. We are hiring expert developers.

YOU You are excited about making the world fitter and healthier. You are detailed-oriented and believe the little things matter. You're passionate about our mission and you have a history of doing great work, even if not professionally, then I'd love to talk to you.

See more at: https://angel.co/fitmob/jobs or feel free to reach out to me directly at <hn-username> @ fitmob.com
